channel.title: Leukaemia on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections
channel.description: Recent content in Leukaemia on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections

item.title: Childhood infectious diseases and risks of leukaemia in an adult population
item.description: Children who had whooping cough during childhood, had a 1.5-2 times lower risk of developing some types of leukemia.
